description.p: pycrypto contains the Python Cryptography Toolkit. This is a thirdparty package that is included mainly to support the paramiko SSH library, which is also included with ROS.

This package contains version 2.0.1 of Python-Crypto, which is the last version released by A.M. Kuchling. It has since been taken over by Dwayne C. Liteznberger, but there are no new releases. The hope is to update to newer versions of Python-Crypto as soon as they become available -- the 2.0.1 version contains deprecation warnings with Python 2.6 and reportedly has other bugs worth fixing.

package.author: A.M. Kuchling/www.amk.ca, ROS package maintained by Ken Conley
